getReason(int, java.util.Locale).Description: Obtains the reason phrase for a status code.

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit English reason phrases for HTTP status codes. All status codes defined in RFC1945 (HTTP/1.0), RFC2616 (HTTP/1.1), and RFC2518 (WebDAV) are supported.
